info.game_comments: (Sarah: Stay tuned for Jeopardy! and learn some important baseball skills.  Pbht!)

(1, 1).clue: Kentucky leads the nation in the production of this corn-based whiskey

(6, 1).clue: Of assault, battery & collusion, the Manhattan park
